resources.string:
"Donate your points to Charity!

"
"You can donate some of your points to charity to help support good causes and make a real difference!

"
"We have a number of donation programs and partners you able to view below."

"Marie Curie is remembered for her discovery of radium and polonium, and her huge contribution to the fight against cancer. This work continues to inspire our charity's mission to support people living with terminal illness, including cancer."

"The British Red Cross has been helping millions of people in the UK and around the world get support they need when crisis strikes. From hiring a wheelchair or dealing with loneliness, to adjusting to life in a new country - weâ€™re there when you need us."

This page is dedicated for requesting a garbage pickup by your local garbage disposal company. \nYou only have to fill in the form below, we will redirect this information to your local garbage disposal company and redirect their approval-question to this page, once this is signed your local company will arrange the rest

Jens, you recycled approximately 16kg of plastic, and 48kg of glass. This accounts to a total of 64 kg!

Thank you!

Your next SUPER reward is at 150kg!

Do you want to ramp up your number of trees planted but have no more bottles to recycle? Use the button below to plant a tree for just 200 points and the tree will be added to your total amount of trees planted!
